name: Excavator Simulator PRO 2021
description:
Are you ready for the hardest and most advanced JCB Excavator Simulator game?

JCB Excavator hydraulic cranes digger games of 2021. This offline heavy city excavator simulator game of 2021 is highly recommended for best addictive game players of hydraulic driving machines. It is a City Construction Simulator game. Backhoe Loader is also available in the game.

This is the best and newly excavator simulator game. It needs PRO skills!

-You can use all of the excavator functions.
-Front Forkflit
-Backhoe Loader
-Bucket, Direction, Extend and Arms
-All of theese are available in the game!
-You must control all of theese.

How is it play?
-You must drive the excavator
-You must move the object to construction
-You can use the all of the excavator functions.
-You should help the complete the construction

20+ Levels are available!
